AdvAccountForecastFact.name: AdvAccountForecastFact
AdvAccountForecastFact.description: Represents information about the generated advanced account forecast records.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the advanced account forecast record.

AdvAcctForecastSetPartnerId.description: The account forecast set partner for which the advanced account forecast records are generated.

AdvAcctForecastSetUseId.description: The advanced account forecast set use that's associated with the advanced account forecast fact record. Available in API version 57.0 and later.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The currency used for the forecast values.

ForecastedQuantity.description: The total forecasted quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

ForecastedRevenue.description: The total forecasted revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LastYearOrderQuantity.description: The previous year order quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

LastYearOrderRevenue.description: The previous year order revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

Name.description: The name of the advanced account forecast fact.

OpportunityQuantity.description: The opportunity quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

OpportunityRevenue.description: The opportunity revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

OrderQuantity.description: The order quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

OrderRevenue.description: The order revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this advanced account forecast fact.

PeriodId.description: The period for which the advanced account forecast records are generated.

PeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the period for which the advanced account forecast fact records are generated. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

ProductId.description: The product for which the advanced account forecast records are generated.

SalesAgreementQuantity.description: The Sales Agreement quantity for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

SalesAgreementRevenue.description: The Sales Agreement revenue for the generated advanced account forecast set records.

Status.description: The status of the forecast set associated with the advanced account forecast record.
